parameters.query:
-- Query to get a single user by telegram_id along with their settings and rate limits
SELECT 
    u.id,
    u.telegram_id,
    u.username,
    u.first_name,
    u.language_code,
    u.is_premium,
    u.created_at,
    us.notification_enabled,
    us.preferred_language,
    us.ai_model_preference,
    us.system_prompt,
    us.current_session_id,
    rl.daily_limit,
    rl.monthly_limit,
    rl.current_daily_usage,
    rl.current_monthly_usage,
    rl.last_reset_daily,
    rl.last_reset_monthly
FROM 
    users u
LEFT JOIN 
    user_settings us ON u.id = us.user_id
LEFT JOIN
    rate_limits rl ON u.id = rl.user_id
WHERE 
    u.telegram_id = {{ $('Telegram Trigger').item.json.message?.from.id ?? $('Telegram Trigger').item.json.callback_query?.from.id }};

parameters.toolDescription:
Use this tool to analyze images with AI-powered vision. Simply provide an image_url along with a question or instruction, and the AI will interpret and describe its contents based on your request. Whether you need object recognition, scene understanding, text extraction, or any other visual analysis, this tool has you covered.

Example Uses:

"What's in this image?"  Get a detailed description of the scene.
"Extract any visible text from this image."  Identify and return text present in the image.
"Describe this artwork in detail."  Receive insights about artistic elements.
"Does this image contain any logos?"  Detect brand logos and symbols.
If there's anything you need confirmation on regarding the image, simply ask, and the AI will provide the most relevant details!
